Class CareerCenterStaffController

java.lang.Object
controller.BaseController
controller.CareerCenterStaffController
public class CareerCenterStaffController extends BaseController
Controller for Career Center staff operations such as approving internships, managing company representative registrations and processing withdrawal requests.

This controller provides administrative functionality for Career Center staff including:

  • Reviewing and approving/rejecting internship postings
  • Managing company representative account approvals
  • Processing student withdrawal requests
  • Viewing and filtering all system data for oversight

  • Constructor Details

    • CareerCenterStaffController

      public CareerCenterStaffController(CompanyRepRepository companyRepRepo, InternshipRepository internshipRepo, ApplicationRepository applicationRepo, WithdrawalRequestRepository withdrawalsRepo, CareerCenterStaffRepository staffRepo)
      Constructs a CareerCenterStaffController with required repositories.
      Parameters:
      companyRepRepo - repository for company representative data operations
      internshipRepo - repository for internship data operations
      applicationRepo - repository for application data operations
      withdrawalsRepo - repository for withdrawal request data operations
      staffRepo - repository for career center staff data operations

  • Method Details

    • listPendingInternships

      public List<Internship> listPendingInternships()
      Returns all internships currently awaiting Career Center approval.

      These are internships that have been submitted by company representatives but have not yet been reviewed by staff.

      Returns:
      list of internships with status PENDING, or empty list if none pending

    • listUnapprovedReps

      public List<CompanyRep> listUnapprovedReps()
      Returns company representatives pending approval (neither approved nor rejected).

      These are newly registered representatives who require staff review before they can access the system.

      Returns:
      list of unapproved company representatives, or empty list if none pending

    • listAllReps

      public List<CompanyRep> listAllReps()
      Returns all company representatives in the system regardless of approval status.
      Returns:
      list of all company representatives, or empty list if none exist

    • listPendingWithdrawals

      public List<WithdrawalRequest> listPendingWithdrawals()
      Returns all withdrawal requests currently pending staff review.

      These are requests from students to withdraw applications that require staff approval before being processed.

      Returns:
      list of pending withdrawal requests, or empty list if none pending

    • listAllInternships

      public List<Internship> listAllInternships()
      Returns all internships in the system regardless of status or visibility.

      Includes approved, rejected, pending, and hidden internships for complete administrative oversight.

      Returns:
      list of all internships, or empty list if none exist

    • approveInternship

      public void approveInternship(String staffId, String internshipId, boolean makeVisible)
      Approves a pending internship and optionally makes it visible to students.

      Once approved, the internship can accept applications from students. The visibility flag determines if it appears in student browsing immediately.

      Parameters:
      staffId - the unique identifier of the staff member performing the approval
      internshipId - the unique identifier of the internship to approve
      makeVisible - if true, the internship will be immediately visible to students; if false, it remains hidden until made visible separately
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the internship cannot be found
      IllegalStateException - if the internship is not in PENDING state

    • rejectInternship

      public void rejectInternship(String staffId, String internshipId)
      Rejects a pending internship (cannot be reopened).

      Rejected internships are permanently closed and cannot be resubmitted or made visible to students.

      Parameters:
      staffId - the unique identifier of the staff member performing the rejection
      internshipId - the unique identifier of the internship to reject
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the internship cannot be found
      IllegalStateException - if the internship is not in PENDING state

    • approveCompanyRep

      public void approveCompanyRep(String staffId, String repEmail)
      Approves a pending company representative registration.

      Once approved, the representative can log in and manage internships for their company.

      Parameters:
      staffId - the unique identifier of the staff member performing the approval
      repEmail - the email address of the representative to approve
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the representative cannot be found
      IllegalStateException - if the representative is already approved

    • rejectCompanyRep

      public void rejectCompanyRep(String staffId, String repEmail, String reason)
      Rejects a company representative registration with an optional reason.

      The rejection reason is communicated to the representative and the account cannot be used to access the system.

      Parameters:
      staffId - the unique identifier of the staff member performing the rejection
      repEmail - the email address of the representative to reject
      reason - optional rejection reason communicated to the representative; if null, a default message is used
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the representative cannot be found
      IllegalStateException - if the representative is already rejected

    • approveWithdrawal

      public void approveWithdrawal(String staffId, String wrId, String note)
      Approves a withdrawal request and marks the associated application as withdrawn.

      The application is immediately withdrawn and the student's slot is freed up for other applicants.

      Parameters:
      staffId - the unique identifier of the staff member performing the approval
      wrId - the unique identifier of the withdrawal request
      note - optional staff notes added to the withdrawal record; if null, a default message is used
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the withdrawal request cannot be found
      IllegalStateException - if the request is already processed (not PENDING)

    • rejectWithdrawal

      public void rejectWithdrawal(String staffId, String wrId, String note)
      Rejects a withdrawal request (student keeps their application active).

      The application remains in its current status and the withdrawal request is marked as rejected with the provided reason.

      Parameters:
      staffId - the unique identifier of the staff member performing the rejection
      wrId - the unique identifier of the withdrawal request
      note - optional staff notes added to the withdrawal record; if null, a default message is used
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the withdrawal request cannot be found
      IllegalStateException - if the request is already processed (not PENDING)

    • filterInternships

      public List<Internship> filterInternships(InternshipStatus status, String major, String companyName, String level)
      Filters internships by optional criteria (any null parameter is ignored).

      Provides flexible searching across all internships for administrative purposes. All filters are applied conjunctively (AND logic).

      Parameters:
      status - filter by internship status, or null for all statuses
      major - filter by preferred major (case-insensitive), or null for all majors
      companyName - filter by company name (case-insensitive), or null for all companies
      level - filter by internship level, or null for all levels
      Returns:
      filtered list of internships matching all specified criteria, or empty list if no matches found
